Taxon.name: Source.Temperature.Simulated.Thermocouple

mtc:Parameter.name: ThermocoupleType
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: {B, C, D, E, G, J, K, M, N, P, R, S, T}

Taxon.mtc:Definition: The process of generating a simulated temperature in voltage representing a temperature to be measured by a device.
